USA: Francis Drake landed on the coast of California in Drakes Bay.
Japan: Azuchi religious debate have resulted in enforced religious tolerance.
Ireland: Second Desmond Rebellion: James FitzMaurice FitzGerald, a cousin of the 15th Earl of Desmond, landed a small force of rebels at Dingle.
Indonesia: The British navigator Sir Francis Drake passes through Maluku and transit in Ternate on his circumnavigation of the world. The Portuguese establish a fort on Tidore but the main centre for Portuguese activities in Maluku becomes Ambon.
